org.agilewiki.jactor2.common.widgets

Interface Widget

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Transmutable<UnmodifiableByteBufferFactory>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DurableBox, DurableInt, DurableString
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoxFactory.BoxImpl._Box, IntFactory.IntImpl._Int, StringFactory.StringImpl._String, WidgetFactory.WidgetImpl._Widget

    public interface Widget
extends Transmutable<UnmodifiableByteBufferFactory>

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        Widget resolve(java.lang.String _path)
        Returns the widget identified by the path. The widget itself is returned when the path is empty.
        Parameters:
        _path - A set of keys with / as Separators.
        Returns:
        The identified widget, or null.

      • apply

        java.lang.String apply(java.lang.String _params,
                     java.lang.String _contentType,
                     UnmodifiableByteBufferFactory _contentFactory)
                       throws WidgetException
        Update the widget.
        Parameters:
        _params - Defines the operation.
        _contentFactory - The unmodifiable data factory used in the operation.
        Returns:
        A description of what happened.
        Throws:
        WidgetException

      • serialize

        void serialize(java.nio.ByteBuffer _byteBuffer)
        Serialize to a ByteBuffer, starting at the current position. Once written, the content should not change (append only), as a view of the content is retained.
        Parameters:
        _byteBuffer - A ByteBuffer to be updated.

      • childChange

        void childChange(int _delta)
        Signals the change of a child.
        Parameters:
        _delta - The difference in size of the serialized data.
